rules_text:
When this artifact enters, put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature.
Retrofit {3}{G} [i](You may cast this from the battlefield for its retrofit cost. It's a 4/4 artifact creature and loses retrofit.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]As the Legion roamed the wastes, sacred resting places quickly became valuable scavenging sites.[/i]
